content.prompt: Let g be a twice-differentiable, increasing function of t. If g(0) = 20 and g(10) = 220, which of the following must be true on the interval 0 < t < 10?

choices.label: g'(t) = 0 for some t in the interval.
g'(t) = 20 for some t in the interval.
g"(t) = 0 for some t in the interval.
g"(t) > 0 for all t in the interval.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
